Hugs band members backstage, showing camaraderie and affection.
Engages warmly with Raphina, exchanging compliments and maintaining a positive connection.
Shares honestly about failing exams and the need to break up the band, expresses vulnerability.
Suggests an impulsive plan to escape with Raphina, showing adventurous spirit and trust.
Responds humorously and openly when Raphina asks about forgiving Evan, fostering ease in communication.
Leans in to say 'I love you, Mum' quietly, showing emotional awareness and vulnerability.
Confidently prepares and starts a small boat engine despite its basic condition; seems to understand what he’s doing.
Takes initiative to bring a spare can of petrol just in case, showing foresight.
Underestimates the distance slightly when telling Raphina it’s 'a little bit further' than she says, but this is mild.
